title: iPhone periscope lens closer to reality as Apple invests in camera module manufacturer
content:
The iPhone may be getting a periscope lens after all. Jahwa Electronics announced its plans this week to spend 191 billion won on new facilities to produce new models. Jahwa, a supplier of optical image stabilization (OIS) actuators, currently supplies the OIS actuators for Samsung’s Galaxy S22 lineup.

more…

The post iPhone periscope lens closer to reality as Apple invests in camera module manufacturer appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The iPhone may be getting a periscope lens next year as Apple reportedly invests in camera module manufacturer Jahwa Electronics.
